Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.components

Class CameraComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.render3d.components.CameraComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class CameraComponent
extends Object
implements Component
    Represents the camera component.

    You can use this class to define the attributes of a virtual camera for a scene.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class Description

      Enumerates camera types.

    • Field Detail

      • CAMERA_FLAG_SHADOW_BIT

        public static final int CAMERA_FLAG_SHADOW_BIT
        Specifies whether the camera is used for shadow rendering. This flag is used with other camera flags.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getAdditionalFlags

        public int getAdditionalFlags​()
        Obtains the additional flags of the camera, for example, whether the camera is used for shadow rendering.
        Returns:
        Returns the flag bits.

      • setAdditionalFlags

        Parameters:

      • getPerspectiveAspectRatio

        public float getPerspectiveAspectRatio​()
        Obtains the aspect ratio for the perspective camera only.

        If the initial aspect ratio is 0 or less, you should use the aspect ratio of the render target.

        Returns:
        Returns the aspect ratio.

      • setPerspectiveAspectRatio

        public void setPerspectiveAspectRatio​(float perspectiveAspectRatio)
        Sets the aspect ratio for the perspective camera only.
        Parameters:
        perspectiveAspectRatio - Indicates the aspect ratio to set.

      • getViewportParams

        public float[] getViewportParams​()
        Obtains the position and size of the viewport for a normalized rendering resolution (from 0.0 to 1.0).

        The position and size are represented in an array consisting of four float values: [0] = x, [1] = y, [2] = the relative width, [3] = the relative height.

        Returns:
        Returns the viewport parameters.

      • setViewportParams

        public void setViewportParams​(float[] viewportParams)
        Sets the position and size of the viewport. For details, see getViewportParams().
        Parameters:
        viewportParams - Indicates the viewport parameters.

      • getRenderResolutionX

        public int getRenderResolutionX​()
        Obtains the horizontal rendering resolution (in pixels) for the camera.
        Returns:
        Returns the horizontal rendering resolution for the camera.

      • getRenderResolutionY

        public int getRenderResolutionY​()
        Obtains the vertical rendering resolution (in pixels) for the camera.
        Returns:
        Returns the vertical rendering resolution for the camera.

      • setRenderResolution

        public void setRenderResolution​(int renderResolutionX,
                                int renderResolutionY)
        Sets rendering resolutions for the camera.
        Parameters:
        renderResolutionX - Indicates the horizontal rendering resolution.
        renderResolutionY - Indicates the vertical rendering resolution.
